mapper.select: SELECT A.seq, A.title, A.content, B.name, A.pv, DATE_FORMAT(A.reg_dt,'%Y-%m-%d') reg_dt, IF(A.reg_dt > date_sub(now(), interval 1 day),'Y','N') dsp_new_dt FROM board A LEFT JOIN user B ON A.user_id = B.id WHERE type = #{type} ORDER BY A.seq DESC LIMIT #{start_row_num}, #{post_num_base_cnt}
